info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Counts the number of elements inside the bit array that are set to 'value'.
[Parameters] - input data type : not used. - output data type : not used. - measure : input measure. - value : value of bits, 0 or 1 (default).
[Return type] Long-long.
[Examples] Count the number of 1s inside the bit array measure. oph_bit_count('',''measure)
